oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robert Corlew oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Corlew, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Excerpts of an oral history with Robert Corlew, former History Department Chair at MTSC and MTSU. Corlew shares his memories of teaching history, women's issues, race relations, and integration on campus
1. Corlew's experiences as History Department Chair during the 1960s -- 2. Diversification of students and faculty during the 1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Campus life
College students; Women--Education; College integration; College teachers; Middle Tennessee State University
